name: Leah ;)
greetingText: The 17 hour time difference do be making it difficult...BUT
wishText: Hope you enjoy your bday away from studying and exams and can celly a lil until your actual bday party <3
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Hehe! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something...
text5Entry: Because, its not just ANY bday...
outroText: Hope the kiwi wizard shows up to your party ;)
